Package de.hsa.games.deeznutz.botapi

Interface ControllerContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MasterSquirrelBot.ControllerContextImpl, MiniSquirrelBot.ControllerContextImpl 
    public interface ControllerContext

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getViewLowerLeft

        XY getViewLowerLeft()
        Returns:
        lower left corner of the view rectangle

      • getViewUpperRight

        XY getViewUpperRight()
        Returns:
        upper right corner of the view rectangle

      • locate

        XY locate()
        Returns:
        my cell coordinates, i. e. the position of the controlled player entity

      • getEntityAt

        EntityType getEntityAt​(XY xy)
        Parameters:
        xy - : cell coordinates
        Returns:
        the type of the entity at that position or none
        Throws:
        OutOfViewException - if xy is outside the view

      • isMine

        boolean isMine​(XY xy)
        Parameters:
        xy - : cell coordinates
        Returns:
        true, if entity at xy is my master or one of my minis resp.
        Throws:
        OutOfViewException - if xy is outside the view

      • move

        void move​(XY direction)
        Parameters:
        direction - : one of XY.UP, XY.DOWN, ... XY.ZERO_ZERO means I want to pause

      • spawnMiniBot

        void spawnMiniBot​(XY direction,
                  int energy)
        Parameters:
        direction - : one of XY.UP, XY.DOWN, ...
        energy - : start energy of the min, at least 100
        Throws:
        SpawnException - if either direction or energy is invalid

      • implode

        void implode​(int impactRadius)
        Very destructive event (see specification for details). Can only be called for mini bot, otherwise exception.
        Parameters:
        impactRadius - : radius of the impact circle

      • getEnergy

        int getEnergy()
        Returns:
        the current energy of the player entity

      • directionOfMaster

        XY directionOfMaster()
        Returns:
        the direction where the master can be found

      • getRemainingSteps

        long getRemainingSteps()
        Returns:
        how many steps are left until the end of the current round

      • shout

        default void shout​(java.lang.String text)
        implementation is optional
        Parameters:
        text - : the comment of the bot during fighting, e. g. ouch
